title: 820-3115 B- no liquid damage-No Boot-i5
message: I have no idea. Same questions as previous 3V42 stable, ACOK, SMC_RESET, known good magsafe board. You need a green light before the board will do anything. If you change SMC you need to take one from identical donor board!

title: 820-3115 B- no liquid damage-No Boot-i5
message: Stop this short to ground on low voltage rails. Low resistance is natural on a rail that will deliver 3-10 watts of power at 1.05v or 0.9v. Find out where the short to ground on PPBUS_G3H is and solve that.

title: 820-3115 B- no liquid damage-No Boot-i5
message:
Here.

[url]http://www.ohmslawcalculator.com/ohms-law-calculator[/url]

Put 1.05v into that, set power to 5 watts.

​See the resistance that shows up? That's not a short to ground! Your meter will beep, but not a short. That's just low low voltage power lines work.
